title: (x) Flower Mounds Jaguars w/ spiky serifs - (similar to) Penumbra {Mike Y}
content:
I need to ID this font... anyone?.

thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008041629im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jaguar_6264.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Hotel Bellwether - Trajan {Ken M}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008041629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36246 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Looking for a digital Lo Kursiv - Berthold Lo Type {Tiffany} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008041629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36337 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jcantillo

comments.content:
I’ guessing that this is a heavy customization of something like [Penumbra Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008041629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/penumbra-serif/) that has also been slanted.

- Mike Yanega
